title: NWFL 2024 - 25 season to commence January 15
body_text:
Sport
NWFL 2024-25 season to commence January 15
The Nigeria Women Football League, NWFL, has approved Wednesday, January 15, 2025, as the kick-off date for the new season.
The announcement was made through a communiqué at the league’s Annual General Assembly on Tuesday.
The assembly resolved that the league would be played in a group format.
Group A consists of Edo Queens, Abia Angels, Ekiti Queens, Heartland Queens, Confluence Queens, Remo Stars Ladies, Nasarawa Amazons, and Dannaz Ladies FC.
Group B teams are Rivers Angels FC, Ibom Angels FC, Adamawa Queens, Naija Ratels FC, Honey Badgers FC, FC Robo Queens, Bayelsa Queens FC, and Delta Queens FC.
The opening fixture will be between defending champions Edo Queens and Abia Angels, which will take place at the Samuel Ogbemudia Stadium in Benin City.
